pullrequest.title: Add //world/light to the sdf parsing stages and proposal as a sibling of //world/model

content.raw:
I guess I was taking the current proposal literally, in that collisions and visuals wouldn't be able to use the `//pose[@relative_to]` attribute since they aren't mentioned in the proposed parsing stages.

I don't think we need to wait for the nesting proposal to discuss this matter, but rather we could make a counter-proposal to pull request #16 that allows `//collision`, `//visual`, `//sensor`, and `//light` to use `//pose[@relative_to]` in the scope of the parent link without creating implicit frames for these elements.
